sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Dishes } from '../../../interfaces/Dish'
import { RestaurantDiv, RestaurantImg, RestaurantName } from '../ChefOfTheWeek/StyleChefDetails'
import { DesktopDishesContainer, DesktopRestaurantDiv, DishDescription, PriceP, SignatureLogo } from './StyleDish'

export default function DesktopSignatureDish() {
  return (
    <DesktopDishesContainer>
        {Dishes.slice(0,3).map((Dish,index)=>(
                   <DesktopRestaurantDiv> 
                        <RestaurantImg src={Dish.PictureURL} alt=''/>
                        <RestaurantName Mobile={false}> {Dish.name}</RestaurantName>
                        <DishDescription>{Dish.Description}</DishDescription>
                        <SignatureLogo src={Dish.SignatureIcon} alt=''/>
                        <PriceP>{Dish.Price}â‚ª</PriceP>
                    </DesktopRestaurantDiv>))}
    </DesktopDishesContainer>
  )
}
